21</a>, dropping the <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:3;pos:1" You&#39;ll find the deals direct at <a data-i13n="cpos:6;pos:1" href="https://www.playstation.com/en-us/deals/black-friday/">Sony</a> and from other retailers including <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:7;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=3b2f4768-9c27-4192-80b1-b7dd4657d671&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Amazon&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAeUGsFtoJM3xPlR-kLj63nfEtST0-7zH07AV0RA4yxCW&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fstores%2FPlayStationPlayHasNoLimits%2Fpage%2F5AF5EF82-86EF-4699-B450-C232B3BD720E" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/stores/PlayStationPlayHasNoLimits/page/5AF5EF82-86EF-4699-B450-C232B3BD720E?lp_asin=B0CL5KNB9M&amp;ref_=ast_bln&amp;store_ref=bl_ast_dp_brandLogo_sto">Amazon</a> and <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Walmart;elmt:;cpos:8;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=3719d8d4-5edd-4817-998a-91f3229e7323&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=3b2f4768-9c27-4192-80b1-b7dd4657d671&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Walmart&amp;linkText=Walmart&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAcnoTVAPrugBqsfWH5WhFja1edx25xy9Qbpq8VI9EdSQ&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fcp%2Fplaystation-5%2F3475115" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.walmart.com/cp/playstation-5/3475115">Walmart</a> when they launch on Friday.</p> 
<p>Sony’s flagship console remains one of the most popular gaming systems available, and this Black Friday discount makes it even easier to jump in if you haven’t already. The standard PS5 and the slimmer PS5 Digital Edition both offer fast load times, smooth frame rates and crisp visuals powered by the custom AMD Zen 2 processor and RDNA 2 GPU. The difference between them comes down to the disc drive — the standard model includes one, while the Digital Edition relies entirely on digital downloads.</p> <span id="end-legacy-contents"></span>
<p>
 <core-commerce id="a5a3f9b794434e8ebd6594c016b229c0" data-type="product-list" data-original-url="https://www.amazon.com/PlayStation%C2%AE5-Digital-slim-PlayStation-5/dp/B0CL5KNB9M/?th=1"></core-commerce></p> 
<p>For those who want top-tier performance, the PS5 Pro is also getting a rare $100 discount. It features upgraded specs and enhanced ray tracing for sharper graphics, along with improved cooling to handle more demanding titles. Whether you play cinematic single-player hits or fast-paced competitive games, the PS5 lineup remains one of the strongest options on the market for next-gen gaming.</p> 
<p>Each console supports 4K output, 3D audio and access to <a data-i13n="cpos:9;pos:1" href="https://www.playstation.com/en-us/ps-plus/">PlayStation Plus</a>, which unlocks online multiplayer and a rotating library of free games. The DualSense controller remains a highlight, with adaptive triggers and haptic feedback that make everything from racing to combat feel more immersive.</p> 
<p>If you’re already set with a console, there are also a few solid accessory deals to consider for Black Friday. Also starting November 21, the <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:10;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0CQKLS4RP&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=3b2f4768-9c27-4192-80b1-b7dd4657d671&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=DualSense+Wireless+Controller&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL1BsYXlTdGF0aW9uLUR1YWxTZW5zZSUyNTI1QzIlMjUyNUFFLVdpcmVsZXNzLUNvbnRyb2xsZXItV2hpdGUtNS9kcC9CMENRS0xTNFJQL3JlZj1hc3Rfc3RvX2RwX3B1aXM_&amp;signature=AQAAAV8ySoBoMN0RjQvrP07VsWIp79iacx92acV9Loa2V3gC&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FPlayStation-DualSense%2525C2%2525AE-Wireless-Controller-White-5%2Fdp%2FB0CQKLS4RP%2Fref%3Dast_sto_dp_puis" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/PlayStation-DualSense%C2%AE-Wireless-Controller-White-5/dp/B0CQKLS4RP/ref=ast_sto_dp_puis?th=1">DualSense Wireless Controller</a> will be down to $60, a $20 discount available in multiple colors. The premium <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:11;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0BSYFB99D&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=3b2f4768-9c27-4192-80b1-b7dd4657d671&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=DualSense+Edge+controller&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL1BsYXlTdGF0aW9uLUR1YWxTZW5zZS1FZGdlLVdpcmVsZXNzLUNvbnRyb2xsZXItNS9kcC9CMEJTWUZCOTlEL3JlZj1hc3Rfc3RvX2RwX3B1aXM_&amp;signature=AQAAAZdu3k1aB4nUzHi7RMKKqeh59QjPj7oNzNg4CU5zBwxi&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FPlayStation-DualSense-Edge-Wireless-Controller-5%2Fdp%2FB0BSYFB99D%2Fref%3Dast_sto_dp_puis" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/PlayStation-DualSense-Edge-Wireless-Controller-5/dp/B0BSYFB99D/ref=ast_sto_dp_puis?th=1">DualSense Edge controller</a>, which adds customizable buttons and replaceable stick modules, drops to $170 during Black Friday. Meanwhile, the <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:12;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0CJT5DJ16&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=3b2f4768-9c27-4192-80b1-b7dd4657d671&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=PlayStation+Portal&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL1BsYXlTdGF0aW9uLVBvcnRhbC1SZW1vdGUtUGxheWVyLUdhbWluZy1Db25zb2xlL2RwL0IwQ0pUNURKMTY_&amp;signature=AQAAAeDrLN2Z6dNw4BkiwFRmR9xVV3TSMDkh8oueaxcl12Z6&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FPlayStation-Portal-Remote-Player-Gaming-Console%2Fdp%2FB0CJT5DJ16" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/PlayStation-Portal-Remote-Player-Gaming-Console/dp/B0CJT5DJ16?ref_=ast_sto_dp&amp;th=1">PlayStation Portal</a> — Sony’s portable Remote Player that lets you stream games from your PS5 — gets discounted to $180.</p>
